name: Robo (PoulpoGaz)
description:
Follow the history of Robo. A robot which solve programming based puzzle. 

Controls

In the main menu you can use arrow key to move and enter.

In other menus, just use you mouse or you keyboard.

Information

The game is not finished. It needs more levels and the story isn't complete.

Also this game is inspired by Human Resource Machine and 7 Billions Humans.

IMPORTANTE NOTE

This game can run on windows, mac and linux BUT saves doesn't work on mac and linux (due to a mistake that I  currently cannot correct) and when the game try to save it crash. BUT the game tries to save ONLY when you exit the game or when you try to go to the main menu, else you can play all levels.

Sorry for the inconvenience.

Images

I made all the images that are in this game.
